menu.title: Tinolang Manok
menu.description: This classic Pinoy dish is easy and quick to make. You can also use chayote (sayote) in place of green papaya. Slurp!

menu.title: Humba
menu.description: This classic Pinoy dish is easy and quick to make. You can also use chayote (sayote) in place of green papaya. Slurp!
